short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fidget Spinner - the best one ever

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's just like the fidget spinner fad that everyone loves, but better!

Working all day in a boring meeting? Listening to long lecture? Bored to where you have to do something or you will have a fit? Download this extension to turn that fidgetiness into happiness, satisfaction, and fun!

Don't have a real fidget spinner? Or do have one? Either way, you can spin this virtual fidget spinner directly from your Chrome browser! Use 6 different spinners ranging from different colors to different shapes and bearings! Spin it fast, slow, or flick it fast. It's all up to you!
